name: Leaflet Simulator
description:
Leaflet Simulator is a game where you can give out leaflets to other people !!! In game is included campaign mode and endless free mode. Game have realistic graphics too !!!

Note: Pasture Games doesn't warrant that Leaflet Simulator will work on your device. Pasture Games isn't responsible for eventual loss caused by Leaflet Simulator and everything which is connected with it. When you playing Leaflet Simulator, you play at your own risk.
